t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Empress Kaguya? Where are you?
I heard your voice, my Majesty.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Excuse me but I'm not Empress Kaguya. That was Queen Marisa you heard.
Oh. I'm sorry to say, but Empress Kaguya and her courtiers are not here at the moment.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Where are they?
No idea.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't know either.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Speaking of this enchantment, Reimu has said this is totally unacceptable.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Why aren't you also affected like that one siren?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What do you mean?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Reimu claims that she, along with some other folks, looks like complete fools.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: No, all the women don't look like fools. They look great.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My magic protects my body from scents like these.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I hope the Scarlet Devil is happy. She might use her long hair to fend off people without it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Are you referring to that Chinese legend?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: No, but Reimu says it's annoying.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There's no way she can give orders to the Supreme Court or Gensokyo Royal Defense Force with this hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There's nothing much to worry about.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Whenever I'd host a ball, everyone would want Reimu's hand in a waltz.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Why are you complaining? Everyone looks amazing now.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: She doesn't want to look cool. She wants her old hair back.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I might as well start playing this song on my harp.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you sing this song in front of Reimu, it will be an embarrassment for her.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: How will it be an embarrassment?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It will be an epic failure.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I might as well go on with the show!
